name: Extreme shooter in universe
description:
My game has 3 guns and when the fps player shoots  5 hits with the guns the enemy dies.

5  hits -> Enemy dies

For Scope press right click and left click for shoot  (only for sniper)

w   move forward ; s move backward; a move left; d move right

Left + shift + w  move fast (sprint)

To pause  the game press Escape

when moves to exit door after all gems were collected
